text: Kyungôn, United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency is a village in Pathein Township, Pathein District, in the Ayeyarwady Region of northern- central Myanmar. It lies beside a former oxbow lake of the Pathein River west of the river at the edge of the flood plain.Burma 1:250,000 topographic map, Series U542, NE46-16 Bassein, U.S. Army Map Service, September 1959 The oxbow lake has been converted to paddy."Kyungôn" Google Earth ==Notes== ==External links== *"Kyungon Map — Satellite Images of Kyungon" Maplandia World Gazetteer Category:Pathein
title: Kyungôn
